name: Type the Entire of Ulysses. That's It. That's the Game.
summary: Finally, a typing game with the entire of James Joyce's Ulysses in it. In "Type The Entire Of Ulysses. That's It. That's The Game." you will type out Ulysses and pretty much nothing else.
